law.catch_line: Exemption of state fairgrounds and exhibition center operations from license taxes.
law.text: None of the provisions of KRS Chapter 137 and none of the provisions of KRS 91.200 shall apply to any operations on state fairgrounds or the exhibition center wherein the State Fair Board shares in the receipts and proceeds of such operations.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 4. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 156, sec. 3, effective June 19, 1952.
